snippet: A former Army specialist who supervised Pfc. Bradley Manning in Iraq testified in his trial on Friday that Private Manning had told her the American flag “meant nothing to him.”
lead_paragraph: A former Army specialist who supervised Pfc. Bradley Manning in Iraq testified in his trial on Friday that Private Manning had told her the American flag “meant nothing to him.”

headline.main: Manning Denied Allegiance to U.S., Judge Is Told

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
